<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº

});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {

    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');

}

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var scripts = document.select("script");

var result = []; // ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æœ€ç»ˆçš„ JSON æ•°æ®

for (var i = 0; i < scripts.size(); i++) {
    var script = scripts.get(i);
    var scriptContent = script.data();

    // åŒ¹é… self.__next_f.push çš„å†…å®¹
    var regex = /self\.__next_f\.push\((.*)\)/gs; // ä½¿ç”¨ /gs ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦åŒ¹é…å¤šè¡Œ
    var matches = [];
    var match;

    // éå†æ‰€æœ‰åŒ¹é…ç»“æœï¼Œä¿ç•™æœ€åä¸€ä¸ª
    while ((match = regex.exec(scriptContent)) !== null) {
        matches.push(match[1]);
    }

    // åªå¤„ç†æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹
    if (matches.length > 0) {
        var content = matches[matches.length - 1]; // è·å–æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹

        // é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼šå°†è‹±æ–‡é€—å·ï¼ˆ,ï¼‰æ›¿æ¢ä¸º ",\n"
        content = content.replace(/,/g, ",\n");

        // æ‰“å°é¢„å¤„ç†åçš„ç»“æœ
        //java.log(content);

        // åŒ¹é… "children":"(.*)" å’Œ "href":"(.*)" çš„æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼
        var childrenRegex = /.*?"children.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var hrefRegex = /.*?"href.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var imgRegex = /.*?"src.*?":.*?"(.*)\\/g;

        var childrenMatches = [];
        var hrefMatches = [];
        var imgMatches = [];

        // æå–åŒ¹é…çš„å†…å®¹
        while ((match = childrenRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // è¿‡æ»¤æ‰ä»¥ "$" å¼€å¤´çš„ children å†…å®¹
            if (!match[1].startsWith("$")) {
                childrenMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = hrefRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // åªåŒ¹é…ä»¥ "/comic.*" å¼€å¤´çš„ href å†…å®¹
            if (match[1].startsWith("/comic")) {
                hrefMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = imgRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // åªåŒ¹é…ä»¥ ".jpg" ç»“å°¾çš„ src å†…å®¹
            if (match[1].endsWith(".jpg")) {
                imgMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }

        // ä»ç¬¬2ä¸ª "children" å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†
        var startIdx = 2; // ç¬¬2ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ä¸º12
        if (childrenMatches.length > startIdx) {
            // æŒ‰æ¯5ä¸ªchildrenåˆ†ç»„
            for (var j = 0; j < hrefMatches.length; j++) {
                var group = {
                    name: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5] || "",
                    latestChapterTitle: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5 + 1] || "",
                    kind: childrenMatches.slice(startIdx + j * 5 + 2, startIdx + j * 5 + 5).join(", "),
                    url: hrefMatches[j] || "",
                    img: imgMatches[j] || "" // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼
                };

}

searchUrl:
https://www.sososhu.com/?site=m43kanshu&q={{key}},{
  headers: { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; PACM00 Build/QP1A.190711.020) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.5359.79 Mobile Safari/537.36" }}

<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//æ‰‹æœºç‰ˆUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
